snippet.title: UI Will Help Test Vaccine for a Potentially Lethal Strain of Bird Flu
snippet.description: * UI Will Help Test Vaccine for a Potentially Lethal Strain of Bird Flu Sep 18, 2013 ... The new avian influenza strain was first detected last spring in China in 135 people, most of whom had contact with poultry. Most affectedÂ ...
